ProjectTitle: Scrolling Until the Trust is Gone? Investigating the Impact of Political Harmful Content on TikTok on Trust in Politics Among Adolescents.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
02/12/2024
Please update your DMP after obtaining ethical approval and submit as intermediate. Please include the data storage and data sharing as approved by SMEC.
Note that pseudonymous data is still personal data under the GDPR and cannot be shared on OSF since this platform does not support access restrictions, however you can upload your data to RDR to only share the metadata openly and the data restricted via the integration dashboard: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard.
label: intermediate DMP needed
